alert.note: Alert for Phelps (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 03 at 8:33AM CST until March 06 at 8:20PM CST by NWS Springfield
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Missouri... Big Piney below Fort Leonard Wood -East Gate affecting Pulaski County. Gasconade River at Jerome affecting Phelps County. .Heavy rainfall tonight and Friday will likely cause the rivers to rise above flood stage. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO MONDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Gasconade River at Jerome. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to Monday evening. * IMPACTS...At 15.0 feet, minor flooding occurs near the gage site. Flood waters reach the lower edge of the concrete building where the gage equipment is located. At 19.0 feet, flood waters begin to overflow the left bank at the gage site. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:45 AM CST Friday the stage was 7.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow morning to a crest of 19.0 feet early Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Sunday evening. - Flood stage is 15.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Many flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov.
